name: Animal Safari Hunter: Sniper S
description:
Animal Safari Hunter: Sniper Shooting is all about thrill & fun. Wild animals are very smart and clever so to be a professional forest wild animal hunter you must have good aim and shooting skills while holding your breath and kill them. In this adventure african sniper animal hunting game encounter your killing and hunting expertise should be at par to win this immersive target while enjoying a best safari wild animal hunting experience in a stunning and deep forest in a winter season kind of environment.
FEATURES
- An ultimate hunting action.
- Gameplay is simple yet entertaining.
- Efficient sniper gun control.
- True to life hunting experience.
- High fidelity cool graphics.
• Dangerous yet beautiful environment Full of wild animals.
